summary.Title: Accountant Europe for Unifeeder, Aarhus
summary.Presentation: Do you want to be part of a skilled team that prioritizes professional development? If you dream about a job with great career opportunities in a large and dynamic organization, take pride

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be part of a skilled team that prioritizes professional development? If you dream about a job with great career opportunities in a large and dynamic organization, take pride in getting the numbers right and enjoy new challenges, then you may be Unifeeder's new Accountant Europe.

betterpeople A/S is on behalf of Unifeeder searching for an Accountant Europe to the Unifeeder Headquarter.

Career opportunities in a global environment
As an Accountant Europe at Unifeeder, you will be part of a finance department with great development potential where you will get professional and skilled colleagues who challenge each other to find the best solutions. Unifeeder has an energetic work environment which includes a dynamic approach and a strong team spirit among colleagues in both Aarhus, Singapore, Dubai, and Limassol.

This large international organization values procedures and structure, but as a result of their growth journey they are open to updating, reassessing, and changing the way they do things. At Unifeeder, you will work close to the management in an organization with short decision paths and good development opportunities. They offer you a flexible and versatile work life filled with development, challenge, and inspiration.

Wide-ranging role with great development opportunities
As an Accountant Europe, you will get a lot of responsibility and collaborate closely with your colleagues to solve tasks. The finance department at Unifeeder is characterized by being a dynamic, deeply committed, and professional team who supports new initiatives and your desired career path.

In this position, you will be handling tasks such as invoicing, bank reconciliations, disbursements, bookkeeping, payments, and participation in the closing of monthly- and annual reports. Furthermore, you will be responsible for invoicing debtors and creditors.

Business-oriented finance profile with a desire for development
You hold a cand.merc.aud. or HD (R) and preferably have some years of experience in auditing, controlling, and/or accounting. You are oriented towards cooperation, and you are motivated by reaching goals with the team within the agreed time frame. There is not only a focus on reaching deadlines but also on your personal and professional development.

It is essential that you are motivated by getting the numbers right and by handling complex tasks. You have an interest in systematics and structure, and you are the type of person who likes to dive into details to achieve the best result. Unifeeder supports your development to keep your competencies up to date and to make sure you are always at the leading edge.

As a person, you are known as the patient and curious colleague who gets involved and strives to reach the best solutions. You are an experienced Excel user with robust IT competencies and the will to work proactively with digitization and process optimization.

Unifeeder
Unifeeder Group is a dynamic logistics company, covering Europe, the Middle East, Asia and the Wider Indian Subcontinent. They operate more than 150 vessels and make the way for +5,2 Mio. containers every year.

Unifeeder simplifies the complex tasks of choosing and managing supply chains by providing efficient and sustainable transport solutions. By expanding the network, coming up with innovative solutions and being agile in day-to-day operations, they enable their customers to concentrate on their core business while Unifeeder makes their cargo flow.

As a key player in global and regional supply chains, they recognize their environmental responsibilities and are committed to contributing to the reduction of local, national & global emissions.

The recruitment is handled by betterpeople A/S
The position is to be filled as soon as possible, and we will be processing applications continuously. However, we are willing to wait for the right candidate. If you have any questions, please contact Sine Fæste at e-mail sfm@betterpeople.dk. All applications are handled confidentially and with discretion. With reference to the GDPR regulations, applications are ONLY received through the link on our website. If you cannot upload your application through this link, please contact us.

PLEASE NOTE: Our job advertisement is automatically and continuously renewed on job portals until the position is filled. A renewal of the job advertisement is not an expression of a reposting, although it may appear so.

(C) betterpeople A/S
